system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal

Effect: The user may freely move up to their Overland Score when declaring this attack. On hit, all valid targets are Flinched.

Requirement: [Snorlax] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Giga Impact on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Pulverizing Pancake

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.
